name: Bodyweight Squat
step_by_step: Squat down under control and stand back up

name: Split Squat
step_by_step: Rear foot stays back as athlete lowers into split squat

name: Reverse Lunge
step_by_step: Step backward into lunge then return to start

name: Lateral Lunge
step_by_step: Step laterally into deep lunge then return

name: Glute Bridge
step_by_step: Lift hips by squeezing glutes

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
step_by_step: Perform glute bridge on one leg

name: Push-Up
step_by_step: Lower chest to floor and push back up

name: Incline Push-Up
step_by_step: Push-up with hands elevated

name: Inverted Row
step_by_step: Pull chest toward bar with body straight

name: Bear Crawl Hold
step_by_step: Hold bear crawl position with knees hovering

name: Dead Bug
step_by_step: Alternate opposite arm and leg while keeping back flat

name: Side Plank
step_by_step: Hold side plank position

name: Skater Jump
step_by_step: Lateral jump from one leg to the other

name: Squat Jump
step_by_step: Squat down and jump vertically

name: Single-Leg Wall Sit
step_by_step: Hold single-leg wall sit position
coaching_cues: Even weight through foot, knee tracks forward

name: Cossack Squat
step_by_step: Squat to one side while opposite leg stays extended

name: Copenhagen Plank
step_by_step: Side plank with top leg supported on bench
coaching_cues: Drive top leg down, hips stacked

name: Broad Jump
step_by_step: Jump forward explosively and stick landing

name: Split-Squat Jump
step_by_step: Jump explosively from split squat stance
coaching_cues: Control landing, switch legs if programmed

name: Forward Lunge Hard Stop
step_by_step: Step forward into lunge and aggressively stop
coaching_cues: Brake with front leg, stable torso

name: Wall Sprint March
step_by_step: Lean into wall and alternate powerful knee drives

name: Barbell Back Squat
step_by_step: Descend under control, drive up through midfoot

name: Front Squat
step_by_step: Squat with bar in front rack position

name: Goblet Squat
step_by_step: Hold weight at chest and squat

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
step_by_step: Push through floor to stand tall

name: Romanian Deadlift
step_by_step: Hinge at hips keeping slight knee bend

name: Hip Thrust
step_by_step: Drive hips upward squeezing glutes

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
step_by_step: Rear foot elevated, lower into split squat

name: Slider/TRX Rear-Foot Split Squat
step_by_step: Back foot placed on slider or suspended in TRX, lower into split squat and return
coaching_cues: Front leg drives, hips stay square

name: Walking Dumbbell Lunge
step_by_step: Step forward into lunge and continue walking

name: Lateral Dumbbell Lunge
step_by_step: Sit into lateral hip then return

name: Step-Up
step_by_step: Step onto box and drive through lead leg

name: Barbell Bench Press
step_by_step: Lower bar to chest and press upward

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
step_by_step: Press dumbbells with neutral control

name: Push Press
step_by_step: Dip slightly then drive bar overhead

name: Medicine Ball Chest Pass
step_by_step: Explosive chest pass into wall

name: Pull-Up
step_by_step: Pull chin over bar under control

name: Lat Pulldown
step_by_step: Pull bar down to chest

name: Barbell Row
step_by_step: Hinge and pull bar to torso

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
step_by_step: Pull dumbbell toward hip

name: Pallof Press
step_by_step: Press handle away resisting rotation

name: Weighted Dead Bug
step_by_step: Hold weight while alternating limbs

name: Cable Chop
step_by_step: Rotate torso pulling cable diagonally

name: Cable Lift
step_by_step: Drive cable upward across body

name: Farmer Carry
step_by_step: Walk holding heavy weight tall posture

name: Suitcase Carry
step_by_step: Carry weight on one side only

name: Medicine Ball Rotational Throw
step_by_step: Rotate and throw ball explosively

name: Box Jump
step_by_step: Jump onto box and step down

name: Trap Bar Jump
step_by_step: Jump with light load for power

name: Landmine Press
step_by_step: Press bar at angle upward

name: Landmine Row
step_by_step: Pull bar toward hip

name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
step_by_step: Hinge on one leg lowering weight

name: Rear-Foot Elevated Hip Thrust
step_by_step: Single-leg hip thrust

name: Hanging Knee Raise
step_by_step: Raise knees under control

name: Overhead Medicine Ball Slam
step_by_step: Drive ball overhead then slam down

name: Single-Leg Box Squat
step_by_step: Sit back onto box on one leg, control descent, stand back up
coaching_cues: Knee tracks, slow down fast up

name: 3-Way Bench Abs
step_by_step: Hang legs off bench, perform vertical tuck, then repeat tucks to right and left

name: Lateral Dumbbell Raise
step_by_step: Raise dumbbells out to sides to shoulder height

name: Front Dumbbell Raise
step_by_step: Raise dumbbells forward to shoulder height

name: Medicine Ball Wall Squat Throw
step_by_step: Squat near wall holding med ball, drive upward and throw ball vertically against wall

name: Stability Ball Heel Tucks
step_by_step: Lie supine with heels on ball, pull heels toward hips and extend

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Snatch
step_by_step: Explosively pull dumbbell from floor to overhead in one motion

name: Max Vertical Jump
step_by_step: Perform maximal vertical jump attempts with full recovery between reps
coaching_cues: Full arm swing, violent extension, stick landing
